name: Stars SLIDE
description:
You have a rule: You can only perform one move at a time vertically or horizontally.

Move the stars through barriers until you find the right path for the stars to reach their final position.

Discover the constellations formed by the stars.

  • Calm and relaxing soundtrack
  • 35 progressive levels for you to learn while playing
  • Minimalist Design: No punctuation, no timer and no pressure. Solve the puzzles in your own time and enjoy the experience of the game.
